featured.title: Global Real Estate Platform
featured.description: A scalable digital real estate platform enabling instant property transactions with AI-powered features, land registry integration, tax calculations, and loan verification systems.
featured.longDescription: As CTO, I architected and deployed this comprehensive property marketplace integrating with Rwanda's land registry APIs, tax calculation systems, and financial loan verification. Features AI-powered recommender models, fraud detection, and NLP-based assistants improving accessibility for underserved users. Achieved 99.5% uptime and 40% query performance improvement.

featured.title: GEOFINDA - Property Discovery Platform
featured.description: A web-based accommodation and property discovery platform built for Africa's rental and listing market, enabling seamless connections between hosts and seekers.
featured.longDescription: Founded and built GEOFINDA to address Africa's fragmented rental market. The platform features real-time property listings, advanced search filters, booking management, and a sustainable payment model for local hosts and agents. Built on Supabase for rapid development with GraphQL APIs.
highlights: Founder & CEO - Full ownership of product
Sustainable revenue model for local agents

featured.title: MobyLife - AI-Powered Mobility Platform
featured.description: A pioneering AI and IoT-powered mobility solution designed to transform Rwanda's public transport system with real-time tracking and smart routing.
featured.longDescription: Co-founded MobyLife to tackle urban mobility challenges in Rwanda. Led system architecture combining AI for demand prediction, IoT for vehicle tracking, and mobile apps for passengers. Incubated at the AI & IoT Innovation Program with partnerships with local transport operators.
highlights: Selected for AI & IoT Innovation Program

featured.title: Personal Portfolio & Blog
featured.description: A modern, high-performance portfolio showcasing my work with dark/light themes, smooth animations, and dynamic content management.
featured.longDescription: This portfolio website featuring a blog system, theme switching, contact form integration, and optimized performance. Built with Next.js 15, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion for smooth animations.
